subject: Haptic Setup
description_text:
I received the haptic pro VM and connected to my Pro X am and not able to
get the haptic motors to work.

-- 

Thanks,
Mark

conversations.body_text: Hi Mark Hathaway,  ​Please go to Settings → Update and click Update to upgrade the software to version 2.0.9. Then, in the same interface, click Manual Firmware Update, navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the prox.sfu file to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, please run the test again.

I tried this and cant get the same software version you show. 


- Mark

>

Hi Mark Hathaway,     When you click "Update", does it not detect the ProX firmware version 2.0.3? Would you like me to assist you remotely? You can install the Todesk software, and I’ll help you check and complete the update.

Thanks, I played around with the files I needed to manually load and finally got it to work. 
- Mark

>
